title: Cataloging and Evaluating Dairy Manure Treatment Technologies

tasks.task: Evaluate technologies for agricultural waste management and product development.
subtasks: Research and compile a database of relevant technologies.
Create case studies for promising technologies.
Develop a nine-point scoring system for evaluating technologies.
Categorize technologies based on recognition and emerging potential.
Implement a vendor information sharing system for customer feedback.
Design an online catalog with comprehensive technology information.
Provide user-friendly search features for navigating the catalog.
Collaborate with technology providers for accurate and updated information.
Continuously update the catalog and scoring system to reflect advancements.
Encourage producer consideration of economic and environmental benefits.
